DataElement.preferredName: Personal Medical History Cancer Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response indicating a patient meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial regarding the receipt of cancer therapeutic procedures.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Personal Medical History Cancer Therapeutic Procedure Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.:Any intervention for management of a malignant neoplasm._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.
